name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description:
Equip: Your abilities have a high chance to summon a phantom ethereal, dealing 180,369 Shadow damage to your target and 16,233 Shadow damage to all other enemies caught in its path. 

If the target is below 35% health, this effect summons two additional phantoms at 25% effectiveness.

effects.display_string: (2) Set: Void Reaper's Contract always summons additional phantoms against enemies afflicted by Queensbane.

spells.description:
Equip: Engrave a ritual seal into your skin binding you to the shadows, granting yourself 2,940 Agility.

Your spells and abilities have a low chance to reduce one of your secondary stats by 3,353 for 10 sec during combat.
